item.title: How to Develop Dependencies With Buildout
item.description: Given you have a decent sized project, with some dependencies… How can you develop and test a dependency against your main project, when it is not yet published on PyPi? Well, until recently, I relied on a strong test suite and mostly developed “blindly”. When I wanted to see the result, I used Vim to directly edit the dependency in my virtual env. There must be a better way And actually, there is and has been for more than a decade.
